law.catch_line: Arbitrators -- Relationship to cabinet and parties.

text.section:
Persons listed on the roster:
Shall comply with the rules and regulations promulgated by the secretary pertaining to arbitration and ethical standards and procedures; and
Who are selected or appointed to hear arbitration matters do not become employees of the Labor Cabinet by virtue of their listing, selection or appointment.

Following selection or appointment, the arbitrator's relationship is solely with the parties, except that arbitrators are subject to the fee schedule and reporting requirements set forth in subsection (1)(d) of KRS 336.1662. Provided that, the secretary may appoint in accordance with the provisions of KRS Chapter 18A such persons as he or she deems necessary to provide the services described in KRS 336.1662 to 336.1664.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1722, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1986.
